changelog.title: CySA+ v3 Analyst Toolkit
changelog.description: CompTIA CS0-003 reference with security operations, vulnerability management, threat intel, and IR tools.

changelog.title: CFR-310 Incident Response
changelog.description: CertNexus CyberSec First Responder toolkit - IR lifecycle, Windows/Linux tools, IOC checklist, containment strategies.

changelog.title: CISM Management Dashboard
changelog.description: ISACA CISM 4 domains - governance outcomes, risk treatment, program maturity, and incident management.

changelog.title: CEH v12 Attack Reference
changelog.description: EC-Council ethical hacking reference with Cyber Kill Chain, MITRE ATT&CK, reconnaissance, and exploitation tools.
